snippet: A federal audit of the authority that runs two of metropolitan Washington’s major airports has criticized how the agency is managed.
abstract: Transportation Dept releases federal audit of authority that runs two of metropolitan Washington, DC’s major airports; report criticizes how agency is managed, including its executives’ practice of accepting expensive gifts from contractors.
lead_paragraph: A federal audit of the authority that runs two of metropolitan Washington’s major airports has criticized how the agency is managed.

headline.main: Managers of Washington Airports Criticized Over Gifts
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Airports’ Managers Criticized Over Gifts
